item.description:
Whist players from all over are going to Webster, MA on Sunday Oct. 7th. The Killdeer Island Club puts on a great card game and the admission cost is only $2.00 AT THE DOOR. They also put on a great buffet, along with homemade soups, sandwiches, desserts, ECT. It is the best $2.00 you could ever spend. The food alone is worth it. Along with the food and card game, they have great door prizes and raffles as well. If you like to play Whist, this is one of the biggest and best games around. Spades, Hearts, Hi-Low Jack, Bridge and Pinochle players will also enjoy this game. The Doors and kitchen open at noon, and the game starts at 1:00p.m.

If you have any questions you can call me, John Gouveia, at 508 345-2675, email me at tauntonwhistclub@yahoo.com, Betty Ann Luchina at 508-949-1498, Patty Zagrocki at 508-943-8626, Ruth Danforth at 508-949-7540 or Ruth Lavigne at 860-923-2379.

group.name: The CardBoard Players Club of Connecticut

item.name: Killdeer Island Public Whist Game
